name: Dogfight (itch) (HuntExe)
description:
Dogfight is a single-player top-down twin-stick shooter. The goal is to survive as long as you can with an onslaught of enemy planes constantly flying at you.

You only have a gun with unlimited ammo, a rechargeable dash, and your wits to survive the horde.

Controls

WASD - Movement

Left Click - Fire

Shift - Dodge

Credits

Programming  and UI - HuntExe

Art - iPixl, MattWalkden

Music - sawsquarenoise
